allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Path ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\handlers'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\database'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\services'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\alembic'' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Path ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\config.py'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\main.py'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\alembic.ini'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\ryadom.db'', ''C:\Users\ID\ryadom_bot\nul'' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host ''Old files removed''")
